name: ent-kaur-16-ene,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating)
definition: ent-Kaurene + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Kaur-16-en-18-ol + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the first step of three-step reaction (see R10066, R06291+R06292+R06293)
